participant_1.background:
I am happy and healthy at my current weight.
I like to spend time with my family in different ways.
my favorite book that i have read lately is middlesex.
i have a large mustache.
I'm always building models of sports cars, so I guess racing is my favorite sport.

participant_2.background:
I want a home with a gym and a racquetball court so I can stay in shape and enjoy my favorite sport.
Others will be impressed by my video editing skills.
My worst fear is that my flower garden will be destroyed.
I treasure my collection of little figurines, which I have been collecting for many years.
I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing pretty good. What about you?
I'm doing well thanks! I just finished reading a book called Middlesex and really enjoyed it. Have you read it?
I haven't heard of that book, but it sounds interesting. What's it about?
It's about a person who is born intersex and has to deal with the challenges of being both male and female. It's a really powerful story.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out. What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, and I also like to build models of sports cars. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to play racquetball and video games. I also like to collect little figurines and design things.
Racquetball sounds like a lot of fun! I've never played it before. What are some of your favorite video games?
I like to play a lot of different video games, but my favorite is probably Super Smash Bros.
I've heard of that game! It looks really fun.
It's a lot of fun to play with friends.
I'm sure it is. Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope you have a great day!
You too! Have a nice day
